ModMetaData.name: Go Explore!
ModMetaData.author: Albion
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds various new world events.
Lost city - The location of a ruined city is discovered. It is dangerous but there is loot from the former inhabitants. Ambrosia addicted animals - A large ambrosia sprout happened nearby. However some animals seem to be hooked in the fruits and defend them. Ship core startup - You detect a nearby energy signature of a ship reactor powering up. Go investigate. New settlement - Some faction founded a new settlement in your general area. Prisoner camp - A non-hostile faction asks you to free some of their prisoners held on a site near your colony. Research request - Another faction is requesting the help of your best researcher in exchange for some insight and a relationship boost. Intercepted message - You intercepted a message that indicates an item stash. Is it a trap or will you find some loot? \nIncludes spanish, russian and ukranian translation.
